english.segment2: - What do you say now when your starin' in the mirror after you fall down Do you feel small when your too weak to stand at all Your on your knees now wishin' you could find a way to hide your fear It's hard to see hope when pain is all you know
english.segment4: - Fearfully and wonderfully made don't you know that you and I were not a mistake ( don't you know, don't you know)
english.segment6: - Oh if you could only see his arms are wide open Oh its okay to be humbled and broken so let your heart be free cause love has been spoken don't you know don't you know love has been spoken
english.segment8: - Hold you head high you an I were born just to shine this light no matter what they say you are loved and you are safe
english.segment10: - Fearfully and wonderfully made don't you know that you and I were not a mistake ( don't you know, don't you know)
english.segment12: - Oh if you could only see his arms are wide open Oh its okay to be humbled and broken so let your heart be free cause love has been spoken don't you know don't you know love has been spoken
english.segment14: - Grace rushing over you his word reveals the truth this love in us is meant to share everywhere
english.segment15: -We're Fearfully and wonderfully made now you an I are not a mistake
